name: Keen Ridge Flex Mid Waterproof Light Trail Shoes - Women's
categories: Ridge Flex Mid Waterproof Light Trail Shoes
description:
Hike your favourite trails with ease. Keen took their classic Targhee hiking boot and added a flexible panel over the toes, reducing the energy needed during each step and increasing durability as it won't crack and weaken overtime. These mid-height boots are great for a variety of conditions, thanks to the waterproof membrane and all-terrain lugged sole.Environmentally-preferred leather and mesh uppers for a durable and secure fit.Keen.Dry waterproof-breathable membrane keeps water out.Webbing heel capture system locks in your foot.Keen.Bellows Flex panel bends for an easy step.Dual-density, compression-moulded EVA midsole with torsion stability shank absorbs impacts and provides support.Non-marking Keen.All-Terrain rubber outsoles with 5mm lugs grip whatever the trail throws at you.

        Sustainability









                      Leather Working Group leather
